pr_title: ArC - make it possible to exclude types and dependencies

timeline.bodyText: Could this be made an immutable class, btw? Not necessarily in this PR.

timeline.bodyText: To avoid this crazy ctor you can make BeanProcessor(Builder builder) ctor instead in which init fields like this.field = builder.field.
timeline.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: Yeah, the builder param is a good idea. I'll update the PR.
